items.name: Key
items.description: A tarnished brass key rescued from a forgotten box.

items.name: Journal
items.description: Your well-worn journal full of undead survival tips.

verbs.look: The door is made of sturdy oak, scarred by claw marks.
verbs.use: You jiggle the handle, but it refuses to turn.
verbs.use_missing: You will need a key if you ever hope to open this.
verbs.use_success: The key turns with a satisfying click as the door creaks ajar.
verbs.talk: You whisper assurances to the door. It remains stoic.

verbs.look: Decades of scandalous headlines are crammed inside.
verbs.use: You rummage through the papers and discover a forgotten key!
verbs.talk: You debate politics with the faded headlines. They disagree.

verbs.look: Ripples shiver across the stagnant water, reflecting neon ghosts.
verbs.talk: You try small talk. The barrel only gurgles.
